build.buildCommand: pnpm install && pnpm --filter @breakagency/shared build && pnpm --filter @breakagency/web build && pnpm --filter @breakagency/api exec prisma generate && pnpm --filter @breakagency/api build

deploy.startCommand: cd apps/api && NODE_ENV=production npx prisma migrate resolve --rolled-back 20260110_add_talent_notes_fields --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma || true && npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma && node dist/server.js
